content:
Sourab Banka9:33 PM
Hello,
I'm Sourab Banka from Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai, India.
I'm familiar with React, React-Native, JavaScript, Python and Django, I have also developed some projects on React and React Native. I came across zulip from the archive page of Google Summer of Code. I have set up the development environment for zulip-mobile and I have gone through all the read the docs section.

But when I run the command react-native run-android i get the following error:

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

What went wrong:
Could not open settings remapped class cache for 8xjj32r11t99w40bb4d7rc26g (C:\Users\soura\.gradle\caches\5.5.1\scripts-remapped\settings_3lm6crajgve51r2nw0gpkheyl\8xjj32r11t99w40bb4d7rc26g\settings607e3b0704a468e3ccebfac8f1ad43c0).
Could not open settings generic class cache for settings file 'C:\Users\soura\OneDrive\Desktop\Open_Source\zulip-mobile\android\settings.gradle' (C:\Users\soura\.gradle\caches\5.5.1\scripts\8xjj32r11t99w40bb4d7rc26g\settings\settings607e3b0704a468e3ccebfac8f1ad43c0).
BUG! exception in phase 'semantic analysis' in source unit '_BuildScript_' Unsupported class file major version 57

I already had this similar issue while working on another react-native project and I did resolve it by updating the particular lines of the file android/gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.properties
from
distributionUrl=https\://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-5.5-all.zip
to
distributionUrl=https\://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-6.0.1-all.zip

As far as I know this is a problem particularly concerned with jdk version as i am using jdk13
Should i do this particular change and proceed ahead or should i downgrade my jdk version?

I'm aiming for GSoC 2020.
Thanks.

I did resolve it by switching to jdk8 the zulip-mobile application works fine now.
@Sourab Banka these messages should have been posted to #mobile; just an FYI for next time. Welcome!
